transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Namaste sir.
Customer: Namaste sir.
Customer: Sir aap kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Sir main Shorya baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Aap se baat kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Haan haan. Bataiye sir.
Customer: Aap verify lead karke kuch bhejoge mujhe?
Executive: Haan maine sir aapse bola tha. Main associate karunga abhi thodi der se aapko bhej dunga.
Customer: Theek hai. Abhi aapke pass
Executive: Ki list agar mere pass aati to main turant hi aapko bhej deta sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Main dekh raha hun sir abhi thodi der se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Verification lead to be sent.



Resolution:

- Executive will send the verification lead shortly.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will send the verification lead shortly.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

verification lead
